data.eml:eml: A taxonomic study of the genus Amusurgus Brunner von Wattenwyl from China (Orthoptera, Gryllidae, Trigonidiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article He, Zhuqing, Li, Kai, Fang, Yan, Liu, Xianwei (2010): A taxonomic study of the genus Amusurgus Brunner von Wattenwyl from China (Orthoptera, Gryllidae, Trigonidiinae). Zootaxa 2423: 55-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194524
